name: Pedium
description: A premium blogging platform with AI, 3D aesthetics, and block-based editing.
instructions:
Go to your Appwrite Console:

1. **Database**:
   - Database ID: 'pedium_db'
   - Collection ID: 'articles'
   - Attributes:
     - title (String, 255, Required)
     - content (String, 10000000, Required) -> Note: This now stores JSON string from Editor.js
     - summary (String, 5000, Required)
     - userId (String, 255, Required)
     - authorName (String, 255, Required)
     - tags (String, Array, Optional)
     - createdAt (String, 255, Required)
     - coverImageId (String, 255, Optional) <--- NEW!

2. **Storage** (Left Sidebar):
   - Click 'Create Bucket'
   - Name: 'Article Covers'
   - ID: 'article_covers' (Must be exact)
   - Permissions: 
     - Role 'Any' -> Read
     - Role 'Users' -> Create, Read, Update, Delete

3. **Database Permissions**:
   - Ensure 'articles' collection has Role 'Any' (Read) and 'Users' (Create, Update, Delete).
